comments.html: Beer + Networking Discussion + Ivan Pepelnjak. If I could afford the plane ticket I'd be there.

comments.html: Let's call it a beer at 8pm then, just to let us finish hands-on workshops safely. We'll meet at reception desk, and maybe we'll have some fancy t-shirts to spare :)
